data.title: The Cossacks (1960)
data.meta_description: Set in the 1850s in Czar Alexander II's Russia, this drama and adventure film focuses on the strife between the Circassian Muslims, led by Shamil and Czar Alexander.
data.text:
This is... actually really good? Like, this is a legitimately actually really good movie. Like, this is an actual movie. I mean, I barely could understand the plot, since I watched a stunning HD print of the Italian dub, but I cannot find any subtitles, let alone an English dub (which I suspect would be for a shorter cut down version anyways). But in the absence of knowing the dialogue, I find great appreciation in the core, base elements of the film.

Where do we start? Might as well start with what grabbed me immediately as soon as the film started: The visual storytelling, cinematography, and compositions. This is where the film shines because this is amazing, especially in comparisonâ€¦
